hero.title: AlquilaFácil
hero.subtitle: The ideal solution for renting spaces and monitoring events in real time
hero.description: Both landlords and tenants access alerts and smart tools for a safe and efficient event.

discover.title: DISCOVER UNIQUE SPACES
discover.description: Explore a wide variety of spaces for events, meetings or special moments. From our mobile app, filter by location, size, price, and find the perfect place that suits your needs.

space1.title: Modern event hall
space1.description: A spacious and elegant hall, ideal for weddings and corporate events. Includes audiovisual equipment and catering available.

space2.title: Shared office downtown
space2.description: Modern office with included services such as Wi-Fi, meeting room and cafeteria.

space3.title: Outdoor terrace
space3.description: Enjoy a beautiful view and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for cocktails and social events.

publish.title: PUBLISH YOUR SPACE
publish.paragraph1: At AlquilaFácil, you have the opportunity to share your unique space with a wide audience. By registering in our application, you will be able to publish your space for events, meetings or celebrations and connect with people looking for the perfect place.
publish.paragraph2: Simply describe your space, set your availability and price, and start receiving reservations. AlquilaFácil provides you with the ideal platform to maximize the use of your space and generate additional income.
publish.users: Some of these AlquilaFácil users are looking for your space:
publish.question: What are you waiting for to start renting your spaces?

monitoring.title: SMART MONITORING WITH IoT
monitoring.description: Thanks to IoT sensors, AlquilaFácil allows landlords to detect smoke, noise, movement in restricted areas or excess capacity. Notifications are sent directly to the tenant's mobile app for a timely response.

sensor1.title: Smoke sensors
sensor1.description: Detects presence of smoke in your premises in real time.

sensor2.title: Noise sensors
sensor2.description: Detects excess noise at all times.

sensor3.title: Movement sensors in restricted areas
sensor3.description: Detects movement in restricted areas in your premises in real time.

sensor4.title: Capacity control
sensor4.description: Control the capacity of your premises in real time and avoid fines for overcrowding.

benefits.title: BENEFITS OF USING ALQUILAFÁCIL
benefits.description: With AlquilaFácil, both hosts and users enjoy a unique and enriching experience. Here are some key advantages:

benefit1.title: Variety of spaces adapted to each need
benefit1.landlords: For landlords: Publish any type of premises, from auditoriums to outdoor terraces. Expand your visibility on a platform specialized in events.
benefit1.tenants: For tenants: Explore unique spaces for social events, meetings or coworking. Access premises filtered by location, type or capacity.

benefit2.title: Fast and secure management from wherever you are
benefit2.landlords: For landlords: Manage your spaces from the web: edit prices, availability, report maintenance and view reservation history.
benefit2.tenants: For tenants: Review your past reservations, add spaces to favorites and check the available calendar directly from your mobile app.

benefit3.title: Real-time security and control with IoT sensors
benefit3.landlords: For landlords: Receive alerts if smoke, overcrowding or high noise is detected. Protect your property without needing to be present.
benefit3.tenants: For tenants: Receive notifications when any event rule is violated, so you can act before the landlord intervenes.

benefit4.title: Real reviews that generate trust
benefit4.landlords: For landlords: Know what tenants think of your spaces and improve your reputation with each good review.
benefit4.tenants: For tenants: Check the opinions of other users before booking, making sure the space meets your expectations.
